faq.title: FAQ | Beswib
faq.description: Frequently Asked Questions about buying, selling, and organizing events on Beswib.

contact.title: Contact | Beswib
contact.description: Get in touch with the Beswib team for any questions or inquiries.

contact.contactDescription: We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
contact.interactiveDescription: Click to discover more about our social presence
contact.useContactForm: Use the contact form to reach us.
contact.runnerOrganizer: Whether you're a runner with a question about selling a bib, or an organizer interested in listing your race on BibUp, this form is for you.
contact.ourTeamResponds: Our team responds quickly — whether it's for:
contact.sellBibNotListed: You want to sell a bib but the race isn't on Bibup?
contact.organizerAuthorize: You're an organizer and want to authorize bib sales
contact.fillFormResponse: 👉 Fill out the form and we'll get back to you within 24h.

form.messageResponse: We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

faq.title: FAQ | Beswib
faq.description: Questions fréquemment posées sur l'achat, la vente et l'organisation d'événements sur Beswib.

contact.title: Contact | Beswib
contact.description: Entrez en contact avec l'équipe Beswib pour toute question ou demande.

contact.contactDescription: Nous aimerions avoir de vos nouvelles. Envoyez-nous un message et nous vous répondrons dès que possible.
contact.interactiveDescription: Cliquez pour découvrir plus sur notre présence sociale
contact.useContactForm: Utilisez le formulaire de contact pour nous joindre.
contact.runnerOrganizer: Que vous soyez coureur avec une question sur la revente d'un dossard, ou organisateur intéressé pour lister votre course sur BibUp, ce formulaire est fait pour vous.
contact.ourTeamResponds: Notre équipe vous répond rapidement — que ce soit pour :
contact.sellBibNotListed: Vous voulez vendre un dossard mais la course n'est pas sur Bibup ?
contact.organizerAuthorize: Vous êtes organisateur et vous voulez autoriser la vente de dossard
contact.discussPartnership: Ou tout simplement discuter d'un partenariat
contact.fillFormResponse: 👉 Remplissez le formulaire et on revient vers vous sous 24h.

form.messageResponse: Nous vous répondrons dès que possible.

faq.title: FAQ | Beswib
faq.description: Beswib에서 이벤트 구매, 판매 및 조직에 대한 자주 묻는 질문입니다.

contact.title: Contact | Beswib
contact.description: 질문이나 문의사항이 있으시면 Beswib 팀에 연락해 주세요.

contact.contactDescription: 여러분의 의견을 듣고 싶습니다. 메시지를 보내주시면 최대한 빨리 답변해 드리겠습니다.
contact.interactiveDescription: 저희 소셜 활동에 대해 자세히 알아보려면 클릭하세요
contact.useContactForm: 연락하기 위해 문의 양식을 사용해 주세요.
contact.runnerOrganizer: 빕 판매에 대한 질문이 있는 러너이든, BibUp에 레이스를 등록하는 데 관심 있는 주최자이든, 이 양식은 여러분을 위한 것입니다.
contact.ourTeamResponds: 저희 팀은 빠르게 답변합니다 — 다음을 포함하여:
contact.sellBibNotListed: 빕을 팔고 싶은데 레이스가 Bibup에 등록되지 않았나요?
contact.discussPartnership: 또는 단순히 파트너십에 대해 논의하고 싶으신가요?
